text: Marcel Gleyre (June 17, 1910 - March 22, 1996) was an American gymnast. He competed in the men's vault event at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1996 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:People from the canton of Vaud
title: Marcel Gleyre
